## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G43090](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G43090)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>IPMI SSU1</u>
- **Gene Name:** isopropylmalate isomerase small subunit 1
- **Description:**   Aconitase/3-isopropylmalate dehydratase protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2041081
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
